EHFA_HEADER_TAG2009101914552900FALSE20091019153719002009101915371900{2D7F0F96-8C18-4E82-B2A5-8F54DAEF940A}Metadata imported.C:\DOCUME~1\Aimee\LOCALS~1\Temp\xml39.tmp2008101610131000Aimee GaddisUnknownUnknownDataset copied.C:\ACE_GIS_projects\NERRS_GIS_Data\Sapelo_Island\SAPNERRboundary2009051310214400Dataset copied.I:\MB7\Projects\SITB\NERRS_Clement\CDMO Transfer\Bundled_boundaries\Bundled_boundaries\SAPNERRboundary2009101914552900Not for Legal useMicrosoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000enSapelo Island National Estuarine Research Reserve Boundary Abstract Prepared by: Aimee Gaddis
The SINERR boundaries were based on the 1975 Environmental Impact Statement Proposed Estuarine Sanctuary Grant Award section for Duplin River, McIntosh County, Georgia prepared by the Office of Coastal Zone Management NOAA. The proposed grant was awarded in June 1975 to fund the acquisition of about 6,150 acres of highland and marsh. The acquisition included five land purchases based on a document entitled "Proposed Acquisition by the State of Georgia of Tracts of the Sapelo Island Research Foundation, Inc." This Plat of Survey was prepared for the Georgia Department of Natural Resources by George P. Underwood, Jr. & Associates, Inc., more particularly G.P. Underwood, Jr. Georgia Registered Land Surveyor Number 1927. The base map used for the survey was The U.S. Department of Commerce Coast and Geodetic Survey, Chart No. 574, 3rd Edition, dated May, 1962, revised March, 1965, further revised December 31, 1965 and entitled "Sapelo and Doboy Sounds," with a scale of 1:40,000 at 31° 28' Mercator Projection. The criteria used to delineate the boundaries were the legal descriptions used in the general warranty deeds for each deed transaction. These included both natural boundaries (i. e. centerline of roads, centerline of tidal creeks, low water marks) and distance in feet to iron spike sets or concrete monument, or nonmonumented points with coordinate points for direction, i.e. north, south, east west.
This data set contains the boundary area for Sapelo Island National Estuarine Research Reserve SINERRThe purpose of the creation of this this data set was to show the boundary line for the SINERRNOAA ERDUnknownSapelo Island National Estuarine Research Reserve BoundarySAP_RB_1994vector digital data\\AAMB-L-1766140\C\LandCover\forCDMO\SAP\Boundaries\Reserve_Boundaries\SAP_RB_1994.shppublication date19761994unknownunknownCompleteAs needed-81.308031-81.25476531.50046831.377795470748.052477475774.9550693471513.2446383485096.705112Sapelo Islandbarrier island, docks, tabby ruins, lighthouse, range beacon, hammock, forest, beach, GIS, NERR, SINERR, NOAA, DNR, dunes, saltpan, boundary, reserveSapelo Island, Georgia, McIntosh County, Sapelo Island NERR, Sapelo Lighthouse, Duplin, Hog Hammock, R.J.
